high_descs: Turn left and go to the nightstand
Grab the pencil off of the nightstand
Turn the lamp that's on the table on
anns.task_desc: Turning on the lamp while holding a pencil

high_descs: Turn left and walk over to the small end table to the right of the door.
Pick up the pencil off of the end table.
Turn right and take a step forward, then turn left and look down at the lamp.
Turn on the small lamp on the end table.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pencil in the light of a small lamp.

high_descs: Turn to the left and find the small dresser.
Pick up the pencil from the top of the dresser.
Carry the pencil and take a step to the left.
Hold the pencil and turn the lamp on, on top of the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Hold a pencil and turn on the lamp.
